question: I am 66 years of age, my grandfather had diabetes,, the only one in our family that I know of.  I recently had a blood test and and my glucose was 108, so I took another test yesterday and are awaiting results..my real question is what are the ranges now, 6 months ago my blood test showed my glucose was in an acceptable range,, which was up to 125, now I am told it is 99.This discussion is related to/posts/show/227873.
title: pre diabetes
